title: Love & Brimstone
description: Anastazia Proctor finds out that destiny really sucks. Literally. She's a "fixer," a cool, aloof, carefully controlled lawyer, and has earned her "Ice Queen" nickname. When she takes a dream job working for handsome millionaire, Matthias Hawthorne, life as she knows it changes forever. With her life in danger, she must learn to put aside her anger at Matthias for years of deception and accept the truth about her past--and her future. But as they are forced to retreat to the safe haven of Yellowstone, can she escape the haunting echoes of her distant past before more tragedy strikes?
author: Tymber Dalton
